SELECT speed.ID AS id, '超速' AS warningType, speed.VEHICLE_TYPE AS vehicleType, NVL(vehicle.PLATE_NUMBER,'全部') AS plateNumber, CONCAT(CONCAT('设置超速为 ',speed.HIGH_SPEED),' km/h') AS remark
FROM KV_SPEED speed LEFT JOIN KV_VEHICLE_INFO vehicle ON speed.VEHICLE_ID = vehicle.ID
AND speed.VEHICLE_TYPE = #{queryConditionData.vehicleType}
AND vehicle.PLATE_NUMBER IS NULL
AND vehicle.PLATE_NUMBER like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{queryConditionData.plateNumber}),'%')
AND speed.STATE = 0
SELECT * FROM KV_SPEED WHERE VEHICLE_ID = #{vehicleId} and STATE = 0 and ROWNUM = 1
SELECT * FROM KV_SPEED WHERE VEHICLE_TYPE = #{vehicleType} and STATE = 0 and ROWNUM = 1
SELECT * FROM KV_SPEED WHERE ID = #{id} and STATE = 0
